movieGoing1.reason: The films available to see in theaters

movieGoing2.reason: The audio/visual quality of the films

movieGoing3.reason: The price of the movie theater tickets

movieGoing4.reason: The quality of the service at the movie theater

movieGoing5.reason: The physical comfort of the seats at the movie theater

movieGoing8.reason: The ability to have food and beverages brought to your seat

movieGoing11.reason: The availability of 4DX at the movie theater

movieGoing12.reason: The option to use a ticket subscription service
